summary: The Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations for Madison Square Garden Sports Corp. contains forward-looking statements concerning the future operating and financial performance of the company. It highlights the impact of COVID-19 on their future operations and outlines various factors that may affect their future performance, including the duration and severity of the pandemic, changes in professional sports teams' compensation, general economic conditions, demand for sponsorship arrangements, changes in laws and regulations, among others. The report also discusses the distribution of MSG Entertainment to its stockholders and identifies revenue sources, expenses, and factors affecting operating results. Overall, the report provides insights into the company's financial condition, changes in financial condition, and results of operations.
